content: “Everything is only for a day, both that which remembers and that which is remembered. Observe constantly that all things take place by change, and accustom thyself to consider that the nature of the universe loves nothing so much as to change things which are and to make new things like them. For everything that exists is in a manner the seed of that which will be.” ― Marcus Aurelius, Meditations Tune into Nature. Within my reality tunnel, it has became impossible for me to become bored. I shift all my energy in the direction that does not go against my grain. There is not right or wrong, good or bad, true or false. I do not trust my thinking or emotions. I question everything. I’m not blinded by American society.
